recipe.recipe_name: Stuffed Bell Peppers with Quinoa and Black Beans
recipe.ingredients: 4 large bell peppers, tops cut away and seeds removed,1 cup uncooked quinoa, rinsed,1 tablespoon olive oil,1 medium onion, diced,2 cloves garlic, minced,1 teaspoon ground cumin,1 teaspoon chili powder,1 can (15 ounces) black beans, drained and rinsed,1 cup frozen corn kernels, thawed,1 cup low-sodium vegetable broth,1/2 cup shredded reduced-fat cheddar cheese,1/4 cup chopped fresh cilantro,Salt and pepper to taste,Lime wedges for serving
recipe.directions: Preheat oven to 375 F. Place the bell peppers cut-side up in a baking dish; set aside.,In a medium pot, cook quinoa according to package instructions using vegetable broth instead of water.,Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and sauté until soft. Stir in the ground cumin and chili powder and cook for another minute.,Stir the sautéed onion mixture into the cooked quinoa. Add the black beans, corn, half the cheese, cilantro, salt, and pepper. Mix well.,Spoon the quinoa mixture into each bell pepper cavity. Top with the remaining cheese.,Cover the baking dish with aluminum foil and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the foil and bake for another 10 minutes or until the peppers are tender and the cheese is melted and lightly browned.,Serve with lime wedges on the side.
